metadata.title: RHSA-2023:2589: autotrace security update (Moderate)
metadata.description:
AutoTrace is a program for converting bitmaps to vector graphics.

Security Fix(es):

* autotrace: heap-buffer overflow via the ReadImage() at input-bmp.c (CVE-2022-32323)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

Additional Changes:

For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9.2 Release Notes linked from the References section.

bugzilla.text: heap-buffer overflow via the ReadImage() at input-bmp.c

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 is installed
autotrace is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
